title: Metaproteomics tutorial
questions: How can I match metaproteomic mass spectrometry data to peptide sequences derived from shotgun metagenomic data?
How can I perform taxonomy analysis and visualize metaproteomics data?
How can I perform functional analysis on this metaproteomics data?
objectives: A taxonomy and functional analysis of metaproteomic mass spectrometry data.
key_points: With SearchGUI and PeptideShaker you can gain access to multiple search engines
Learning the basics of SQL queries can pay off
